rules.natural: Provided that telecommunications are disrupted, the power grid is damaged.
Whenever a tropical storm forms, severe weather occurs.
If a cyclone intensifies, then severe weather occurs.
Under the condition that an emergency protocol is enabled, it is not the case that a coastal area is avoided.
If an early warning is activated, then whenever safety measures are implemented, an evacuation route is not allowed.
Either an early warning is activated or monitoring stations are deployed.
Provided that monitoring stations are deployed, then if safety measures are implemented, an evacuation route is not allowed.
Atmospheric data is collected or a weather model is analyzed.
If a weather model is analyzed, then severe weather occurs.
A trading decision is delayed, or provided that atmospheric data is collected, a radar image is shown.
Whenever a financial product is approved, a trading decision is not delayed.
A financial product is approved or a risk assessment is rejected.
If a risk assessment is rejected, then a trading decision is not delayed.
Under the condition that a weather derivative is bought, a hedge strategy is executed.
A weather derivative is bought or an insurance contract is sold.

Whenever regulatory approval is required, then if it is not the case that if an insurance contract is sold then provided that it is not the case that if severe weather does not occur then an agricultural region is not affected, crop loss is not caused, profit is made from an event.

Provided that documentation is submitted, then if it is not the case that if wind speed exceeds a threshold then a derivative payout is triggered, a derivative contract is not canceled, a financial claim is settled.
Documentation is submitted or contract terms are verified.

When regulatory standards are complied with, then if contract terms are verified, then provided that it is not the case that if wind speed exceeds a threshold then a derivative payout is triggered, a derivative contract is not canceled, a financial claim is settled.
If trading rules are violated, then a penalty is incurred.
Trading rules are violated or regulatory standards are complied with.
A storm path is predicted or a rainfall amount is forecast.
If a rainfall amount is forecast, then under the condition that it is not the case that if severe weather does not occur then a hurricane occurs in a region, an insurance policy is activated.
Provided that a damage cost is estimated, then if it is not the case that if severe weather does not occur then a hurricane occurs in a region, an insurance policy is activated.
Whenever coverage terms are modified, a premium rate is adjusted.
If compliance requirements are met, then provided that it is not the case that if a storm path is predicted then a damage cost is estimated, coverage terms are modified.
Under the condition that a compliance officer is hired, compliance requirements are met.
A compliance officer is hired or staff members are trained.
If staff members are trained, then compliance requirements are met.
Provided that an insurance claim is processed, a derivative payout is triggered.

Whenever a financial product is offered, then if it is not the case that if it is not the case that if severe weather does not occur then a hurricane occurs in a region, an insurance policy is activated, an insurance claim is processed.
Whenever precipitation levels are shown, severe weather occurs.
Whenever data quality is maintained, a software system is updated.
Provided that a software system is updated, then in the event that it is not the case that if a weather map is displayed then precipitation levels are shown, a data error is corrected.
If critical infrastructure is protected, then telecommunications are not disrupted.
Provided that a security protocol is enforced, an access zone is not restricted.
Under the condition that a trading platform is suspended, a derivative contract is not canceled.
If weather conditions are monitored, then a tropical storm forms or a cyclone intensifies.
Whenever a weather station is operated, real-time data is transmitted.
A weather station is operated or weather conditions are monitored.
Provided that equipment failure is experienced, real-time data is not transmitted.
Equipment failure is experienced or a maintenance check is performed.
Under the condition that repair work is scheduled, then if a maintenance check is performed, real-time data is not transmitted.
Whenever replacement parts are ordered, then provided that a maintenance check is performed, real-time data is not transmitted.
If an operations team is managed, then repair work is scheduled or replacement parts are ordered.
An operations team is managed or an emergency response is coordinated.
Provided that an emergency response is coordinated, then repair work is scheduled or replacement parts are ordered.
Whenever a meteorological alert is issued, a weather report is broadcast.
A meteorological alert is issued or satellite data is published.
If satellite data is published, then a weather map is displayed.
If it is not the case that a tropical storm forms or a cyclone intensifies, then a coastal area is avoided.

If it is not the case that if an insurance contract is sold then provided that it is not the case that if severe weather does not occur then an agricultural region is not affected, crop loss is not caused, then profit is not made from an event.
Whenever it is not the case that if a storm path is predicted then a damage cost is estimated, a premium rate is not adjusted.

Under the condition that it is not the case that if wind speed exceeds a threshold then a derivative payout is triggered, a trading platform is suspended.

Under the condition that it is not the case that if investor interest is attracted then market share is increased, competition is not faced.

Provided that it is not the case that if it is not the case that if wind speed exceeds a threshold then a derivative payout is triggered, a derivative contract is not canceled, a financial claim is not settled.
